Talented barbers

Our nearly 80 committed talented barbers are ready to help.

Satisfied customers

The Barbers is an affordable, convenient and good quality place to get my hair cut. It is a friendly, laid back environment with great professionals. It is also friendly for all ages from kids to adults! Herman miller - Switzerland Great barber shop. Walked in and they took me immediately without an appointment. Quick haircut, great service and reasonable price. I didn't have to wait at all when I got to the barbershop. Matthew taylor - New York Barber was friendly and professional. He asked me what kind of hairstyle I want/used to have and he gave me his input on what he thinks would look good with my head shape. Cheers guys! Leonel mooney - London PREV NEXT + Haircuts per week + Shaved per week + Stylization per week + Washing per week
